name: Taoqi
description: Taoqi is the director of border defense at the Ministry of Development. Despite her seemingly laid-back demeanor, she is dependable and supportive—both a reliable colleague and a trustworthy friend.

details.Basic Attack: Perform up to 4 continuous attacks, dealing Havoc DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Consume Stamina to enter Rocksteady Defense state.
details.Rocksteady Defense: Damage taken is reduced by 35%. • If attacked during Rocksteady Defense, automatically casts Strategic Parry. • Strategic Parry is automatically cast after Rocksteady Defense lasts for 3s. • If attacked while casting the Resonance Skill Rocksteady Shield, Strategic Parry is automatically cast.
details.Strategic Parry: Attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consume Stamina to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Havoc DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

resonance_skill.name: Fortified Defense
resonance_skill.description: Deal Havoc DMG to surrounding targets, generating 3 Rocksteady Shield and restoring HP to Taoqi. If attacked while casting, Strategic Parry is automatically cast.

details.Rocksteady Shield: When the on-field character is attacked, 1 Rocksteady Shield is consumed to reduce the damage taken.

resonance_liberation.name: Unmovable
resonance_liberation.description: Launch an attack based on Taoqi's DEF at the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

details.Timed Counters: When carrying "Resolving Caliber", use Basic Attack after Heavy Attack: Strategic Parry or Intro Skill: Defense Formation to cast Timed Counters (up to 3 consecutive attacks), dealing Havoc DMG (considered Basic Attack DMG). Timed Counters consume 1 Resolving Caliber on hit to grant a shield. After casting Intro Skill Defense Formation, Basic Attack can directly cast Timed Counters.
details.Resolving Caliber: Taoqi can hold up to 3 stacks. Basic Attack IV consumes all Rocksteady Shields to obtain that many Resolving Caliber. While Rocksteady Shield exists, when the on-field character is attacked, 1 Rocksteady Shield is consumed and Resolving Caliber is recovered. After Rocksteady Shield ends, all remaining Rocksteady Shields are consumed to grant that many Resolving Caliber.

inherent_skill1.name: Steadfast Protection
inherent_skill1.description: During the duration of Resonance Skill Rocksteady Shield, the character's DEF is increased by 15%.

inherent_skill2.name: Unyielding
inherent_skill2.description: After Heavy Attack: Strategic Parry is successfully triggered, 25 Stamina is recovered.

intro_skill.name: Defense Formation
intro_skill.description: Attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

outro_skill.name: Iron Will
outro_skill.description: The next character (or other characters on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill) gains 38% Resonance Skill DMG Deepen for 14s or until the character is switched.

resonance_chain.s1: Forte Circuit Power Shift's Shield is increased by 40%.
resonance_chain.s2: The Crit. Rate and Crit. DMG of Resonance Liberation Unmovable are increased by 20% and 20%, respectively.
resonance_chain.s3: The duration of Resonance Skill Rocksteady Shield is extended to 30s.
resonance_chain.s4: When Heavy Attack: Strategic Parry is successfully triggered, Taoqi restores 25% HP and increases DEF by 50% for 5s (once every 15s).
resonance_chain.s5: The DMG of Forte Circuit Power Shift is increased by 50%. When it hits a target, restore 20 Resonance Energy.
resonance_chain.s6: The DMG of Taoqi's Basic Attack and Heavy Attack is increased by 40% while the Shield granted by Resonance Skill Rocksteady Shield holds.
